titleStmt.title: A voyage to the East-Indies giving an account of the Isles of Madagascar, and Mascareigne, of Suratte, the coast of Malabar, of Goa, Gameron, Ormus : as also A treatise of the distempers peculiar to the eastern countries : to which is annexed an abstract of Monsieur de Rennefort's History of the East-Indies, with his propositions for the improvement of the East-India Company / written originally in French by Mr. Dellon ...
Relation d'un voyage des Indes Orientales. English
titleStmt.author: Dellon, Gabriel, b. 1649.

titleStmt.title: A voyage to the East-Indies giving an account of the Isles of Madagascar, and Mascareigne, of Suratte, the coast of Malabar, of Goa, Gameron, Ormus : as also A treatise of the distempers peculiar to the eastern countries : to which is annexed an abstract of Monsieur de Rennefort's History of the East-Indies, with his propositions for the improvement of the East-India Company / written originally in French by Mr. Dellon ...
Relation d'un voyage des Indes Orientales. English
titleStmt.author: Dellon, Gabriel, b. 1649.
M. C. Treatise of the distempers relating in particular to the eastern countries.
Crull, J. (Jodocus), d. 1713?
Rennefort, Souchu de, ca. 1630-ca. 1690. Histoire des Indes orientales. English. Selections.
Dellon, Gabriel, b. 1649. Traité des maladies particulières aux pays orientaux et dans la route et de leurs remèdes. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for D. Browne ..., A. Roper ..., and T. Leigh ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation by Jodocus Crull of: Relation d'un voyage des Indes orientales.

Special t.p. on p. [221]: A treatise of the distempers relating in particular to the eastern countries, and such other diseases as commonly happen in the voyages into those parts, with their proper remedies / by M.C., D.D., E.M.
Special t.p. and separate pagination (43 p.): A supplement to the Sieur Dellone's relation to the East-Indies, &c.
Reel 622:4 has "A treatise of the distempers" only, as Wing C85 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
This item appears at reel 180:1 as Wing D943 (number changed to D943A in Wing 2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in British Library and Bodleian Library, Oxford.
